hero.title: Supporting Communities Through Action
hero.subtitle: We work to create lasting impact in communities around the world through dedicated programs and partnerships.

about.general_desc: Assalam Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to promoting sustainable development and empowerment in local communities.
about.mission_desc: Our mission is to provide comprehensive support to individuals and families in need through education, health, and economic development programs.
about.vision_desc: We envision a world where every community has the tools and support needed to thrive and grow.
about.values_desc: We believe in human dignity, solidarity, and sustainability as the foundation of our work.
about.history: Founded in 1992, Assalam Foundation has been working for over 30 years in the field of national solidarity.
about.values_list: Solidarity, Empowerment, Dignity, Education, Compassion, Sustainability

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know
faq.q1: How can I contribute to your mission?
faq.a1: You can contribute in several ways: make a donation, become a volunteer, or share our mission with your network.
faq.a2: We run education, community health, and sustainable economic development programs across various regions.
faq.q3: How do you ensure transparency in your actions?
faq.a3: We regularly publish impact reports and work with independent auditors to ensure transparency.
faq.q4: Can I visit your projects on the ground?
faq.a4: Yes, we organize guided visits for interested donors. Contact us for more information.

hero.title: About Assalam Foundation
hero.description: A Moroccan charitable organization dedicated to improving the living conditions of vulnerable individuals and families through education and solidarity

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Assalam Social Development Foundation is a Moroccan charitable organization dedicated to improving the living conditions of vulnerable individuals and families. Since its establishment in 1992, the foundation has worked to strengthen social cohesion and support the most needy categories through comprehensive programs in education, health, and sustainable development.
overview.additional: We believe that every individual deserves a chance for a dignified life, and we strive to achieve this through effective partnerships and direct field work.

solidarity.title: Solidarity
solidarity.desc: A deep spirit of help to support the most needy categories.

dignity.title: Dignity
dignity.desc: Providing assistance that preserves the individual's honor and self-esteem.

education.title: Education
education.desc: The key to liberation from childhood to professional integration.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.desc: Giving means to young people and women to become active.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.desc: Projects designed for long-term positive impact.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: Complete integrity in resource management and reporting.

cta.description: Contribute to building a better society and be part of our journey in sustainable giving.

events.description: Beginning work in the field of social development and humanitarian aid.

events.description: Launch of education and solidarity programs for vulnerable categories.

events.title: Women's Empowerment

events.title: Sustainable Future
events.description: Continuing sustainable giving to achieve the dignity of the Moroccan citizen.

hero.title: Our Projects: A Tangible Impact on Community Life
hero.description: From education to economic empowerment, we launch initiatives aimed at building a sustainable future for every Moroccan citizen.

rayhana.title: Rayhana Assalam
rayhana.description: A comprehensive educational program for children and youth in local communities.
rayhana.detailed_description: Rayhana Assalam is a comprehensive educational program aimed at providing high-quality education to children and youth in deprived areas. The program includes lessons in reading, writing, and mathematics, in addition to cultural and recreational activities.
rayhana.impact: More than 500 children beneficiaries, 95% success rate in school exams.

himaya.title: Himaya Center
himaya.description: Support for women and families in difficulties through comprehensive social services.
himaya.detailed_description: Himaya Center provides psychological and social support to women and families facing difficulties. The program includes individual and group counseling, and assistance in obtaining legal and social rights.
himaya.impact: More than 200 families beneficiaries, 98% satisfaction rate from beneficiaries.

fataer.title: Fataer Al Baraka
fataer.description: Women's economic empowerment center through training and financial support.
fataer.detailed_description: Fataer Al Baraka program aims to economically empower women through training them in traditional and modern crafts, and providing small loans to start their own businesses.
fataer.impact: More than 150 women economically empowered, creation of 50 small businesses.

imtiaz.title: Imtiaz Program
imtiaz.description: Sponsorship for brilliant students and provision of advanced educational opportunities.
imtiaz.detailed_description: Imtiaz Program supports academically brilliant students through scholarships, advanced training courses, and cultural exchange opportunities with international universities.
imtiaz.impact: More than 100 brilliant students beneficiaries, 80% of them succeeded in joining prestigious universities.

kafala.title: Kafala Program
kafala.description: Complete support for children and orphans through sponsorship and care.
kafala.detailed_description: Kafala Program provides comprehensive care for children and orphans, including education, health care, and psychological and social support.
kafala.impact: More than 300 children beneficiaries, noticeable improvement in health and education.

nadi.title: Nadi Assalam
nadi.description: Economic autonomy center for youth and adults.
nadi.detailed_description: Nadi Assalam provides vocational training and support for youth and adults to achieve economic independence through workshops and specialized training programs.
nadi.impact: More than 250 youth beneficiaries, 75% employment rate after training.

Projects.contribute_desc: Your support helps us expand this project and help more beneficiaries.

opening-new-protection-center-casablanca.title: Opening of the New Protection Center in Casablanca
opening-new-protection-center-casablanca.excerpt: As part of expanding our social services, a new center has been opened to support vulnerable families...
opening-new-protection-center-casablanca.content:
In an important step towards expanding our social services, the new Protection Center in Casablanca was inaugurated last Saturday. The new center aims to provide comprehensive support to vulnerable families and children in difficult situations.

Center Objectives

The center includes several basic services:

  • Psychological and social counseling
  • Educational support for children
  • Assistance in obtaining legal rights
  • Vocational training programs for parents

Expected Impact

We expect more than 500 families to benefit from the center's services in the first year of its launch. This project comes as part of the association's plan to expand its geographical reach and enhance its positive impact on society.

"This center is not just a building, but a new hope for families who need support and help."

- Association Director

We thank all partners and donors who contributed to the success of this project. Their continued support enables us to achieve our goals in serving the community.
opening-new-protection-center-casablanca.author: Communication Team

new-education-program-success.title: New Education Program Achieves Great Success
new-education-program-success.excerpt: We offer a comprehensive educational program for children in remote areas...
new-education-program-success.content:
Our new educational program continues to achieve remarkable results in remote areas. The program, which was launched six months ago, now covers more than 20 villages in various regions.

Program Components

The program combines basic education with recreational activities:

  • Lessons in reading, writing, and mathematics
  • Sports and artistic activities
  • Psychological support for children
  • Distribution of books and stationery

Initial Results

The program recorded a success rate of up to 95% in school exams. Also, 85% of participating children have become more confident in themselves and integrated into the school community.

This success reflects our commitment to improving educational opportunities for children in remote areas, and confirms the importance of investing in education as a basis for a better future.
new-education-program-success.author: Education Department

success-story-from-street-to-university.title: Success Story: From the Street to University
success-story-from-street-to-university.excerpt: An inspiring journey of a child benefiting from our educational programs...
success-story-from-street-to-university.content:
Ahmed's story, the child who started his journey from the street and reached university seats, inspires thousands and confirms the power of education in changing destinies.

The Difficult Beginning

Ahmed was living on the street with his family five years ago. The difficult circumstances made him lose hope for the future. But his meeting with our volunteer team changed the course of his life.

Joining the Program

Ahmed joined our educational program at the age of 12. He started learning basic reading and writing, then developed to become one of the best students in his class.

The Great Achievement

Today, Ahmed studies at the Faculty of Medicine at Mohammed V University. His dream has become a reality, and he plans to become a doctor to serve his community.

"Education is the key that opened the doors of the future for me. Thank you to the association that believed in me."

- Ahmed

Ahmed's story is a living example of how educational support can change the lives of individuals and communities. We are proud that he is part of our success story.
success-story-from-street-to-university.author: Stories Department
